# Prepare   

```{bash eval=FALSE}
# merge all clean files
for i in *ori.out; do awk '{print $0,FILENAME}' $i |perl -pe 's/\.fa\.ori\.out//'
for i in *ori.out.clean; do awk '{print $0,FILENAME}' $i |perl -pe 's/\.fa\.ori\.out\.clean//'; done > merged.clean.sum

```
